prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon with tree-like features and a spooky aura.
Imagine a Pokemon that blends nature with supernatural elements, like Trevenant.
Design a large, wooden creature that embodies the spirit of a forest.
Show me a Pokemon that has roots and branches as part of its design.
Generate a ghostly entity that protects the forest, resembling a haunted tree.
Make a Pokemon with a dark, earthy appearance and a strong connection to nature.
Give me a mythical forest guardian Pokemon that has a spooky yet friendly vibe.
